g3901.definition: [παραῤῥυέω] from {{g3844}} and the alternate of {{g4482}}; to flow by, i.e. (figuratively) carelessly pass (miss)

g3902.definition: [παράσημος] from {{g3844}} and the base of {{g4591}}; side-marked, i.e. labelled (with a badge (figure-head) of a ship)

g3903.definition: [παρασκευάζω] from {{g3844}} and a derivative of {{g4632}}; to furnish aside, i.e. get ready

g3905.definition: [παρατείνω] from {{g3844}} and teino (to stretch); to extend along, i.e. prolong (in point of time)

g3906.definition: [παρατηρέω] from {{g3844}} and {{g5083}}; to inspect alongside, i.e. note insidiously or scrupulously

g3908.definition: [παρατίθημι] from {{g3844}} and {{g5087}}; to place alongside, i.e. present (food, truth); by implication, to deposit (as a trust or for protection)

g3909.definition: [παρατυγχάνω] from {{g3844}} and {{g5177}}; to chance near, i.e. fall in with

g3910.definition: [παραυτίκα] from {{g3844}} and a derivative of {{g846}}; at the very instant, i.e. momentary

g3911.definition: [παραφέρω] from {{g3844}} and {{g5342}} (including its alternate forms); to bear along or aside, i.e. carry off (literally or figuratively); by implication, to avert

g3912.definition: [παραφρονέω] from {{g3844}} and {{g5426}}; to misthink, i.e. be insane (silly)

g3914.definition: [παραχειμάζω] from {{g3844}} and {{g5492}}; to winter near, i.e. stay with over the rainy season

g3916.definition: [παραχρῆμα] from {{g3844}} and {{g5536}} (in its original sense); at the thing itself, i.e. instantly

g3917.definition: [πάρδαλις] feminine of πάρδος (a panther); a leopard

g3918.definition: [πάρειμι] from {{g3844}} and {{g1510}} (including its various forms); to be near, i.e. at hand; neuter present participle (singular) time being, or (plural) property

g3919.definition: [παρεισάγω] from {{g3844}} and {{g1521}}; to lead in aside, i.e. introduce surreptitiously

g3921.definition: [παρεισδύνω] from {{g3844}} and a compound of {{g1519}} and {{g1416}}; to settle in alongside, i.e. lodge stealthily

g3922.definition: [παρεισέρχομαι] from {{g3844}} and {{g1525}}; to come in alongside, i.e. supervene additionally or steathily

g3923.definition: [παρεισφέρω] from {{g3844}} and {{g1533}}; to bear in alongside, i.e. introduce simultaneously

g3924.definition: [παρεκτός] from {{g3844}} and {{g1622}}; near outside, i.e. besides

g3925.definition: [παρεμβολή] from a compound of {{g3844}} and {{g1685}}; a throwing in beside (juxtaposition), i.e. (specially), battle-array, encampment or barracks (tower Antonia)

g3926.definition: [παρενοχλέω] from {{g3844}} and {{g1776}}; to harass further, i.e. annoy

g3927.definition: [παρεπίδημος] from {{g3844}} and the base of {{g1927}}; an alien alongside, i.e. a resident foreigner

g3928.definition: [παρέρχομαι] from {{g3844}} and {{g2064}}; to come near or aside, i.e. to approach (arrive), go by (or away), (figuratively) perish or neglect, (causative) avert

g3930.definition: [παρέχω] from {{g3844}} and {{g2192}}; to hold near, i.e. present, afford, exhibit, furnish occasion

g3931.definition: [παρηγορία] from a compound of {{g3844}} and a derivative of {{g58}} (meaning to harangue an assembly); an address alongside, i.e. (specially), consolation

g3933.definition: [παρθένος] of unknown origin; a maiden; by implication, an unmarried daughter

g3934.definition: [Πάρθος] probably of foreign origin; a Parthian, i.e. inhabitant of Parthia

g3935.definition: [παρίημι] from {{g3844}} and hiemi (to send); to let by, i.e. relax

g3936.definition: [παρίστημι] , or prolonged      παριστάνωfrom {{g3844}} and {{g2476}}; to stand beside, i.e. (transitively) to exhibit, proffer, (specially), recommend, (figuratively) substantiate; or (intransitively) to be at hand (or ready), aid

g3937.definition: [Παρμενᾶς] probably by contraction for Παρμενίδης (a derivative of a compound of {{g3844}} and {{g3306}}); constant; Parmenas, a Christian

g3938.definition: [πάροδος] from {{g3844}} and {{g3598}}; a by-road, i.e. (actively) a route

g3939.definition: [παροικέω] from {{g3844}} and {{g3611}}; to dwell near, i.e. reside as a foreigner

g3941.definition: [πάροικος] from {{g3844}} and {{g3624}}; having a home near, i.e. (as noun) a by-dweller (alien resident)

g3942.definition: [παροιμία] from a compound of {{g3844}} and perhaps a derivative of {{g3633}}; apparently a state alongside of supposition, i.e. (concretely) an adage; specially, an enigmatical or fictitious illustration

g3943.definition: [πάροινος] from {{g3844}} and {{g3631}}; staying near wine, i.e. tippling (a toper)

g3944.definition: [παροίχομαι] from {{g3844}} and οἴχομαι (to depart); to escape along, i.e. be gone

g3946.definition: [παρόμοιος] from {{g3844}} and {{g3664}}; alike nearly, i.e. similar

g3947.definition: [παροξύνω] from {{g3844}} and a derivative of {{g3691}}; to sharpen alongside, i.e. (figuratively) to exasperate

g3948.definition: [παροξυσμός] from {{g3947}} ("paroxysm"); incitement (to good), or dispute (in anger)

g3949.definition: [παροργίζω] from {{g3844}} and {{g3710}}; to anger alongside, i.e. enrage

g3951.definition: [παροτρύνω] from {{g3844}} and ὀτρύνω (to spur); to urge along, i.e. stimulate (to hostility)

g3952.definition: [παρουσία] from the present participle of {{g3918}}; a being near, i.e. advent (often, return; specially, of Christ to punish Jerusalem, or finally the wicked); (by implication) physically, aspect

g3953.definition: [παροψίς] from {{g3844}} and the base of {{g3795}}; a side-dish (the receptacle)

g3954.definition: [παῤῥησία] from {{g3956}} and a derivative of {{g4483}}; all out-spokenness, i.e. frankness, bluntness, publicity; by implication, assurance

g3955.definition: [παῤῥησιάζομαι] middle voice from {{g3954}}; to be frank in utterance, or confident in spirit and demeanor

g3956.definition: [πᾶς] including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole

g3957.definition: [πάσχα] of Chaldee origin (compare {{h6453}}); the Passover (the meal, the day, the festival or the special sacrifices connected with it)

g3958.definition: [πάσχω] , including the forms      πάθω,  and      πένθω, used only in certain tenses for it apparently a primary verb; to experience a sensation or impression (usually painful)

g3959.definition: [Πάταρα] probably of foreign origin; Patara, a place in Asia Minor

g3960.definition: [πατάσσω] probably prolongation from {{g3817}}; to knock (gently or with a weapon or fatally) Compare {{g5180}}.

g3961.definition: [πατέω] from a derivative probably of {{g3817}} (meaning a "path"); to trample (literally or figuratively)

g3962.definition: [πατήρ] apparently a primary word; a "father" (literally or figuratively, near or more remote)

g3963.definition: [Πάτμος] of uncertain derivation; Patmus, an islet in the Mediterranean

g3964.definition: [πατραλῴας] from {{g3962}} and the same as the latter part of {{g3389}}; a parricide

g3965.definition: [πατριά] as if feminine of a derivative of {{g3962}}; paternal descent, i.e. (concretely) a group of families or a whole race (nation)

g3968.definition: [πατρίς] from {{g3902}}; a father-land, i.e. native town; (figuratively) heavenly home

g3969.definition: [Πατροβᾶς] perhaps a contraction for Πατρόβιος (a compound of {{g3962}} and {{g979}}); father's life; Patrobas, a Christian

g3970.definition: [πατροπαράδοτος] from {{g3962}} and a derivative of {{g3860}} (in the sense of handing over or down); traditionary

g3972.definition: [Παῦλος] of Latin origin; (little; but remotely from a derivative of {{g3973}}, meaning the same); Paulus, the name of a Roman and of an apostle

g3973.definition: [παύω] a primary verb ("pause"); to stop (transitively or intransitively), i.e. restrain, quit, desist, come to an end

g3974.definition: [Πάφος] of uncertain derivation; Paphus, a place in Cyprus

g3975.definition: [παχύνω] from a derivative of {{g4078}} (meaning thick); to thicken, i.e. (by implication) to fatten (figuratively, stupefy or render callous)

g3976.definition: [πέδη] ultimately from {{g4228}}; a shackle for the feet

g3977.definition: [πεδινός] from a derivative of {{g4228}} (meaning the ground); level (as easy for the feet)

g3978.definition: [πεζεύω] from the same as {{g3979}}; to foot a journey, i.e. travel by land

g3979.definition: [πεζῇ] dative case feminine of a derivative of {{g4228}} (as adverb); foot-wise, i.e. by walking

g3980.definition: [πειθαρχέω] from a compound of {{g3982}} and {{g757}}; to be persuaded by a ruler, i.e. (genitive case) to submit to authority; by analogy, to conform to advice

g3982.definition: [πείθω] a primary verb; to convince (by argument, true or false); by analogy, to pacify or conciliate (by other fair means); reflexively or passively, to assent (to evidence or authority), to rely (by inward certainty)

g3983.definition: [πεινάω] from the same as {{g3993}} (through the idea of pinching toil; "pine"); to famish (absolutely or comparatively); figuratively, to crave

g3984.definition: [πεῖρα] from the base of {{g4008}} (through the idea of piercing); a test, i.e. attempt, experience

g3985.definition: [πειράζω] from {{g3984}}; to test (objectively), i.e. endeavor, scrutinize, entice, discipline

g3986.definition: [πειρασμός] from {{g3985}}; a putting to proof (by experiment (of good), experience (of evil), solicitation, discipline or provocation); by implication, adversity

g3987.definition: [πειράω] from {{g3984}}; to test (subjectively), i.e. (reflexively) to attempt

g3988.definition: [πεισμονή] from a presumed derivative of {{g3982}}; persuadableness, i.e. credulity

g3989.definition: [πέλαγος] of uncertain affinity; deep or open sea, i.e. the main

g3990.definition: [πελεκίζω] from a derivative of {{g4141}} (meaning an axe); to chop off (the head), i.e. truncate

g3992.definition: [πέμπω] apparently a primary verb; to dispatch (from the subjective view or point of departure, whereas ἵημι (as a stronger form of εἶμι) refers rather to the objective point or , and {{g4724}} denotes properly, the orderly motion involved), especially on a temporary errand; also to transmit, bestow, or wield

g3993.definition: [πένης] from a primary πένω (to toil for daily subsistence); starving, i.e. indigent Compare {{g4434}}.

g3995.definition: [πενθερός] of uncertain affinity; a wife's father

g3996.definition: [πενθέω] from {{g3997}}; to grieve (the feeling or the act)

g3997.definition: [πένθος] strengthened from the alternate of {{g3958}}; grief

g3998.definition: [πενιχρός] prolongation from the base of {{g3993}}; necessitous

g4000.definition: [πεντακισχίλιοι] from {{g3999}} and {{g5507}}; five times a thousand
